text: "Touch'N You" is a song by American rapper Rick Ross. American singer Usher is featured on the song. It was released as the first single from Ross album God Forgives, I Don't (2012). It was released on May 22, 2012. It was written by Ross and Usher. It was produced by Rico Love and Mr. Morris. The music video was directed by Chris Robinson. It was released on June 19, 2012. ==Chart performance== Charts (2012) Peak position US Bubbling Under Hot 100 Singles (Billboard) 2 Billboard.com 15 Billboard.com 21 ==Release history== Country Date Format Label Ref United States May 22, 2012 Digital download The Island Def Jam Music Group iTunes - Music - Touch'N You (feat. title: Touch'N You
